name: Lock and Key
description:
Lock: Magically lock a door or object
that is capable of being locked. The
target may only be opened by means of
destruction or magic.
FP expended determines lock strength.
Key: Opens a door or object that is
capable of being locked or barred.
If magically locked, FP expended deter-
mines the duration it remains unlocked:
• FP ≤ lock strength: Wit rounds
• FP > lock strength: permanent
